content:
No need to apologize! It was my pleasure to help and share in your enthusiasm. I'm thrilled to have been a part of your preparation process for your interview and salary negotiation. You've got this!

Remember to stay confident, be yourself, and showcase your skills and experience. You've prepared well, and I'm sure you'll do great.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. I'll be here to help.

Good luck with your interview and salary negotiation!
